# Final project

This is my final project for PSY6422 Data Analysis and Visualisation

```{r dataimport}

# importing of the data

df <- read.csv(here("data", "stroke.csv"))
head(df)  # displaying the top of the data frame

```



```{R message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# scatterplot

p1 <- ggplot(df, aes(x=age, y=bmi, color = gender))
p1 + geom_point() + geom_smooth(formula = y~x, method='lm')

p2 <- ggplot(df, aes(x=age, y=bmi, color = gender))
p2 + geom_jitter(height = 0, width = 0.3) + geom_smooth(formula = y~x, method='lm')

ggsave(here("plots", "myplot.png"))

class(df$avg_glucose_level)
```
